article.title: Articolo_31
article.paragraph: Articolo 31was a popular band fromMilan,Italy, meldinghip hop musichip hop,funk, pop and traditional Italian musical forms. They are one of the most popular Italian hip hop groups.
article.heading: Band history
article.paragraph: Members are rapperJ-Ax(real name Alessandro Aleotti) and DJ Jad (Vito Luca Perrini).In the spoken intro ofStrade di Citt, it is stated that the band is named after the article of theIrish constitutionguaranteeing freedom of the press, although it must be noted that article 31 of the Irish constitution is not about the freedom of the press. They probably meant theCensorship_in_the_Republic_of_Ireland#The_TroublesSection 31 of the Broadcasting Authority Act.

Articolo 31was one of the first hip hop groups in Italy, releasing one of the first Italian hip hop records,Strade di citt, in 1993. Soon, they signed withBertelsmann Music GroupBMG Ricordiand started to mix their rap with pop music, obtaining great success and popularity. However, the underground hip hop scene positioned them as traitors.Citation neededDecember 2008Their producer wasFranco Godi, who also produced the music for theSignor Rossianimated series.

In 1997,DJ Gruffdissed Articolo 31 in a track titled1 vs 2appearing on the first album of the beatmaker Fritz da Cat, but Articolo 31'slawyersobtained a retraction of the record, and its reissue without the song.Citation neededDecember 2008
In 2001, Articolo 31 collaborated with the Americanold school hip hopold schoolrapperKurtis Blowon the albumXCh SI!. In the same year, they made the movieSenza filtro(in English,"Without filter").
WithDomani smetto, Articolo 31 left the world of hip hop and moved to rap with many influences; even more so than previously, this album found them rapping and singing to rock and pop tracks.
In recent years, J Ax and DJ Jad have each released solo records, and in 2006, the group declared an indefiniteRecess (break)hiatus.
Their posse,Spaghetti Funk, includes other popular performers like Space One and pop rappersGemelli DiVersi.
